summary: The diff implements fixes for the 'Failed to create profile' error across backend and frontend. REQ-10 is partially addressed with a new backend profile storage approach (saveCallerUserProfile instead of registerUser). REQ-11 and REQ-12 are substantially implemented in SetupPage.tsx and useQueries.ts. However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-calling registerUser for an existing principal returns an appropriate response without overwriting the profile unintentionally.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend uses saveCallerUserProfile which calls userProfiles.add(caller, profile) unconditionally with no guard preventing overwrite of an existing profile and no distinct response for an already-registered user.

missing_requirements.requirement: The useRegisterUser mutation in useQueries.ts uses the correct Candid argument and return types matching the deployed backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff replaces useRegisterUser entirely with useSaveCallerUserProfile. The spec explicitly names useRegisterUser as the mutation to fix, and no such export exists in the modified useQueries.ts.

missing_requirements.requirement: Errors are logged to the browser console with enough detail including error object, principal, and canister ID.
missing_requirements.reason: The error logging in SetupPage includes the error object and principal but does not include the canister ID, which is explicitly required by the acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Added frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts utility with URL parameter parsing, sessionStorage persistence, and admin token handling for caffeineAdminToken.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement in the build request mentions URL parameter utilities, sessionStorage management, or admin token handling. This is unrelated to fixing the profile creation error.

hallucinated_features.description: The useActor.ts hook calls actor._initializeAccessControlWithSecret(adminToken) using an admin token extracted from URL parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions initializing access control with a secret token or admin token flow. This functionality is not part of the fix for the profile creation error.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes a full project, workflow, and task CRUD system with access control authorization mixins.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks to fix the profile creation flow. Adding project, workflow, task management and an authorization mixin system goes beyond the stated requirements and non-goals.
